import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import vividlyContext from "../Context/vividlyContext"; import { faHeart as LikeHeart, faShare, } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { faComment, faHeart, faPenToSquare as faPenRegular, } from "@fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons"; const PostPreview = () => { const context = useContext(vividlyContext); const [postData, setPostData] = useState(""); const { fetchPostPreview } = context; const handlePostData = async () => { const parsedPId = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("postPreview")); const response = await fetchPostPreview(parsedPId); setPostData(response); }; useEffect(() => { handlePostData(); }, []); return (
{console.log(postData)} {/* Post Header */}
